text: Akvilev (; masculine) or Akvileva (; feminine) is a Russian last name.Ganzhina, p. 16 It was artificially created by clergy as a Latin translation of the last name Orlov. ==References== ===Notes=== ===Sources=== *И. М. Ганжина (I. M. Ganzhina). "Словарь современных русских фамилий" (Dictionary of Modern Russian Last Names). Москва, 2001. __NOTOC__ Category:Russian-language surnames
title: Akvilev
